\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tabularht}

\begin{document}
\fbox{%
  \begin{tabularht*}{1in}{4in}{@{}l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r@{}}%
    upper left corner & upper right corner\\%
    \noalign{\vfill}%
    \multicolumn{2}{@{}c@{}}{bounding box}\\%
    \noalign{\vfill}%
    lower left corner & lower right corner\\%
  \end{tabularht*}%
}
\end{document}
\endinput
